pageContent: Objective: To determine the 5-year oncological outcomes of endoscopic extraperitoneal radical prostatectomy (EERPE) from a medium-volume centre, thereby providing much needed data on outcomes from the UK.

metaData.source:
Immune Microenvironment and Response in Prostate Cancer Using Large Population Cohorts
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34777331/
